thread.section_title: TrustedHousesitters Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of TrustedHousesitters | www.trustedhousesitters.com
thread.title: Renae Gray

author: Renae Gray
title: Renae Gray
text: Trusted House Sitters has helped us travel to Australia for 7 weeks and Netherlands for 6 weeks, without the expense of a hotel. We were able to live like locals and experience the culture of these destinations. Our retirement travel is broader and more affordable with Trusted House Sitters. We spent 3 weeks in St. Croix, U.S. Virgin Islands, 2 weeks in Philadelphia, PA., 5 weeks in Charleston, SC., 3 weeks in Austin, TX., 2 Weeks in San Antonio, TX., 2 weeks in Pensacola, FL., 6 weeks in Eureka Springs, AR., and 2 weeks in Kansas City, MO., all with no lodging expense. This is a great way to travel. We love the animals, too.
